Title: Revives causes of action for the sexual assault of an infant which have been barred by the statute of limitations
Summary: Revives causes of action for the sexual assault of an infant which have been barred by the statute of limitations; provides a one year window for such causes of action to be brought.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to actions for sexual assault of an infant and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
